name: Salesforce activity
description: Feed of what's happening in an org

SALESFORCE_USERNAME.description: Login to the Salesforce org to display its streaming updates

SALESFORCE_PASSWORD.description: Combined Salesforce user password & security token, without space between

OBSERVE_SALESFORCE_TOPIC_NAMES.description: Streaming topics to display, comma-separated (default is for Change Data Capture [CDC])

REPLAY_ID.description: Recall a specific checkpoint in the streams (default: `-2` for all possible events)
